thread.title_full: Costco's Cozy Accent Rug Is Perfect for Fall - Parade

author: Choya Johnson
title: Costco's Cozy Accent Rug Is Perfect for Fall - Parade
text:
Nothing says autumn like cozy evenings, warm colors, and inviting textures that transform a space into a seasonal retreat. The right home accents can instantly refresh your surroundings, offering both comfort and a touch of festive spirit. From entryways to kitchens, these details set the tone, welcoming family and guests while making everyday spaces feel more special.
The Harvest Hand-Hooked Accent Rug is a beautiful way to capture that seasonal charm. Measuring 22- x 38-inches itâ€™s perfectly sized to add style and comfort to high-traffic areas or intimate corners of your home. Its hand-hooked craftsmanship creates a textured look that feels artisanal, while the addition of memory foam padding makes it soft and supportive underfoot.
ðŸ³ SIGN UP to get delicious recipes, handy kitchen hacks & fun food news in our daily Pop Kitchen newsletter ðŸ³
22 x 38-inch Harvest Hand-Hooked Accent Rug, $25.99 at Costco
What Is the Rug Made With?
Made in India, this accent rug is thoughtfully constructed with a 100-percent polypropylene pile for durability, a 100-percent polyurethane filling for plush comfort, and a cotton-polyester backing for strength and stability. The 0.63-inch pile height strikes a balance between softness and easy upkeep, making it practical for everyday use. Plus, itâ€™s OEKO-TEXÂ® certified (24.HIN.48401), ensuring it meets high standards for safety and sustainability.
How Should I Care for the Rug?
Caring for the rug is simple: shake it out as needed, spot clean with mild soap and a damp cloth, and let it air dry. For added security and longevity, the use of a rug pad is recommended to prevent slipping and extend its life.
What Shoppers Are Saying
Shoppers have already fallen in love with its seasonal style and quality. One reviewer shared, â€œMy daughter and her family are BIG autumn celebrations people and loved the latch hook rug appearance and quality.â€ Another wrote, â€œI love the black dog rug, I have 2 now, very nice quality. And my own black dog loves them!â€
At $25.99, the Harvest Hand-Hooked Accent Rug is a thoughtful way to welcome fall into your home without breaking the budget. With its mix of handcrafted charm, durability, and cozy design, itâ€™s a piece that enhances both everyday living and seasonal dÃ©cor, making it a must-have for autumn celebrations.
